Package org.cyclops.integratedcrafting.core

Class CraftingHelpers

java.lang.Object
org.cyclops.integratedcrafting.core.CraftingHelpers
public class CraftingHelpers extends Object
Helpers related to handling crafting jobs.

    • beforeCalculateCraftingJobs

      public static void beforeCalculateCraftingJobs(org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.api.network.INetwork network, int channel)
      If the network is guaranteed to have uncommitted changes (such as the one in #48), forcefully run observers synchronously, so that we can calculate the job in a consistent network state.
      Parameters:
      network - The network.
      channel - A network channel.

    • calculateCraftingJobs

      public static <T, M> CraftingJob calculateCraftingJobs(org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.api.network.INetwork network, int channel, org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<T,M> ingredientComponent, T instance, M matchCondition, boolean craftMissing, CraftingHelpers.IIdentifierGenerator identifierGenerator, CraftingJobDependencyGraph craftingJobsGraph, boolean collectMissingRecipes) throws UnknownCraftingRecipeException, RecursiveCraftingRecipeException
      Calculate the required crafting jobs and their dependencies for the given instance in the given network.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The instance type.
      M - The matching condition parameter.
      Parameters:
      network - The target network.
      channel - The target channel.
      ingredientComponent - The ingredient component type of the instance.
      instance - The instance to craft.
      matchCondition - The match condition of the instance.
      craftMissing - If the missing required ingredients should also be crafted.
      identifierGenerator - identifierGenerator An ID generator for crafting jobs.
      craftingJobsGraph - The target graph where all dependencies will be stored.
      collectMissingRecipes - If the missing recipes should be collected inside UnknownCraftingRecipeException. This may slow down calculation for deeply nested recipe graphs.
      Returns:
      The crafting job for the given instance.
      Throws:
      UnknownCraftingRecipeException - If the recipe for a (sub)ingredient is unavailable.
      RecursiveCraftingRecipeException - If an infinite recursive recipe was detected.

    • calculateCraftingJobs

      public static CraftingJob calculateCraftingJobs(org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.api.network.INetwork network, int channel, org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.capability.recipehandler.IRecipeDefinition recipe, int amount, boolean craftMissing, CraftingHelpers.IIdentifierGenerator identifierGenerator, CraftingJobDependencyGraph craftingJobsGraph, boolean collectMissingRecipes) throws FailedCraftingRecipeException, RecursiveCraftingRecipeException
      Calculate the required crafting jobs and their dependencies for the given instance in the given network.
      Parameters:
      network - The target network.
      channel - The target channel.
      recipe - The recipe to calculate a job for.
      amount - The amount of times the recipe should be crafted.
      craftMissing - If the missing required ingredients should also be crafted.
      identifierGenerator - identifierGenerator An ID generator for crafting jobs.
      craftingJobsGraph - The target graph where all dependencies will be stored.
      collectMissingRecipes - If the missing recipes should be collected inside FailedCraftingRecipeException. This may slow down calculation for deeply nested recipe graphs.
      Returns:
      The crafting job for the given instance.
      Throws:
      FailedCraftingRecipeException - If the recipe could not be crafted due to missing sub-dependencies.
      RecursiveCraftingRecipeException - If an infinite recursive recipe was detected.

    • getGlobalCraftingJobIdentifier

      public static CraftingHelpers.IIdentifierGenerator getGlobalCraftingJobIdentifier()
      Returns:
      An identifier generator for crafting jobs.

    • getOutputQuantityForRecipe

      public static <T, M> long getOutputQuantityForRecipe(org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.capability.recipehandler.IRecipeDefinition recipe, org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<T,M> ingredientComponent, T instance, M matchCondition)
      Calculate the effective quantity for the given instance in the output of the given recipe.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The instance type.
      M - The matching condition parameter.
      Parameters:
      recipe - A recipe.
      ingredientComponent - The ingredient component.
      instance - An instance.
      matchCondition - A match condition.
      Returns:
      The effective quantity.

    • calculateCraftingJobs

      protected static <T, M> CraftingJob calculateCraftingJobs(IRecipeIndex recipeIndex, int channel, Function<org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<?,?>,org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.storage.IIngredientComponentStorage> storageGetter, org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<T,M> ingredientComponent, T instance, M matchCondition, boolean craftMissing, Map<org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<?,?>,org.cyclops.cyclopscore.ingredient.collection.IngredientCollectionPrototypeMap<?,?>> simulatedExtractionMemory, CraftingHelpers.IIdentifierGenerator identifierGenerator, CraftingJobDependencyGraph craftingJobsGraph, Set<org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IPrototypedIngredient> parentDependencies, boolean collectMissingRecipes) throws UnknownCraftingRecipeException, RecursiveCraftingRecipeException
      Calculate a crafting job for the given instance. This method is merely an easily-stubbable implementation for the method above, to simplify unit testing.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The instance type.
      M - The matching condition parameter.
      Parameters:
      recipeIndex - The recipe index.
      channel - The target channel that will be stored in created crafting jobs.
      storageGetter - A callback function to get a storage for the given ingredient component.
      ingredientComponent - The ingredient component type of the instance.
      instance - The instance to craft.
      matchCondition - The match condition of the instance.
      craftMissing - If the missing required ingredients should also be crafted.
      simulatedExtractionMemory - This map remembers all extracted instances in simulation mode. This is to make sure that instances can not be extracted multiple times when simulating.
      identifierGenerator - An ID generator for crafting jobs.
      craftingJobsGraph - The target graph where all dependencies will be stored.
      parentDependencies - A set of parent recipe dependencies that are pending. This is used to check for infinite recursion in recipes.
      collectMissingRecipes - If the missing recipes should be collected inside UnknownCraftingRecipeException. This may slow down calculation for deeply nested recipe graphs.
      Returns:
      The crafting job for the given instance.
      Throws:
      UnknownCraftingRecipeException - If the recipe for a (sub)ingredient is unavailable.
      RecursiveCraftingRecipeException - If an infinite recursive recipe was detected.

    • calculateCraftingJobs

      protected static PartialCraftingJobCalculation calculateCraftingJobs(IRecipeIndex recipeIndex, int channel, Function<org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<?,?>,org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.storage.IIngredientComponentStorage> storageGetter, org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.capability.recipehandler.IRecipeDefinition recipe, int amount, boolean craftMissing, Map<org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<?,?>,org.cyclops.cyclopscore.ingredient.collection.IngredientCollectionPrototypeMap<?,?>> simulatedExtractionMemory, CraftingHelpers.IIdentifierGenerator identifierGenerator, CraftingJobDependencyGraph craftingJobsGraph, Set<org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IPrototypedIngredient> parentDependencies, boolean collectMissingRecipes) throws RecursiveCraftingRecipeException
      Calculate a crafting job for the given recipe. This method is merely an easily-stubbable implementation for the method above, to simplify unit testing.
      Parameters:
      recipeIndex - The recipe index.
      channel - The target channel that will be stored in created crafting jobs.
      storageGetter - A callback function to get a storage for the given ingredient component.
      recipe - The recipe to calculate a job for.
      amount - The amount of times the recipe should be crafted.
      craftMissing - If the missing required ingredients should also be crafted.
      simulatedExtractionMemory - This map remembers all extracted instances in simulation mode. This is to make sure that instances can not be extracted multiple times when simulating.
      identifierGenerator - An ID generator for crafting jobs.
      craftingJobsGraph - The target graph where all dependencies will be stored.
      parentDependencies - A set of parent recipe dependencies that are pending. This is used to check for infinite recursion in recipes.
      collectMissingRecipes - If the missing recipes should be collected inside UnknownCraftingRecipeException. This may slow down calculation for deeply nested recipe graphs.
      Returns:
      The crafting job for the given instance.
      Throws:
      RecursiveCraftingRecipeException - If an infinite recursive recipe was detected.

    • calculateCraftingJobDependencyComponent

      protected static <T, M> PartialCraftingJobCalculationDependency calculateCraftingJobDependencyComponent(org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<T,M> dependencyComponent, Map<org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<?,?>,org.cyclops.cyclopscore.ingredient.collection.IngredientCollectionPrototypeMap<?,?>> dependenciesOutputSurplus, MissingIngredients<T,M> missingIngredients, Set<org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IPrototypedIngredient> parentDependencies, Map<org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.capability.recipehandler.IRecipeDefinition,CraftingJob> dependencies, IRecipeIndex recipeIndex, int channel, Function<org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<?,?>,org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.storage.IIngredientComponentStorage> storageGetter, Map<org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<?,?>,org.cyclops.cyclopscore.ingredient.collection.IngredientCollectionPrototypeMap<?,?>> simulatedExtractionMemory, CraftingHelpers.IIdentifierGenerator identifierGenerator, CraftingJobDependencyGraph craftingJobsGraph, boolean collectMissingRecipes) throws RecursiveCraftingRecipeException
      Throws:
      RecursiveCraftingRecipeException

    • addRemainderAsSurplusForComponent

      protected static <T1, M1, T2, M2> void addRemainderAsSurplusForComponent(org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<T1,M1> ingredientComponent, List<T1> instances, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.ingredient.collection.IngredientCollectionPrototypeMap<T1,M1> simulatedExtractionMemory, org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<T2,M2> blackListComponent, T2 blacklistInstance, M2 blacklistCondition, long blacklistQuantity)

    • scheduleCraftingJobs

      public static void scheduleCraftingJobs(ICraftingNetwork craftingNetwork, CraftingJobDependencyGraph craftingJobDependencyGraph, boolean allowDistribution, @Nullable UUID initiator) throws UnavailableCraftingInterfacesException
      Schedule all crafting jobs in the given dependency graph in the given network.
      Parameters:
      craftingNetwork - The target crafting network.
      craftingJobDependencyGraph - The crafting job dependency graph.
      allowDistribution - If the crafting jobs are allowed to be split over multiple crafting interfaces.
      initiator - Optional UUID of the initiator.
      Throws:
      UnavailableCraftingInterfacesException - If no crafting interfaces were available.

    • scheduleCraftingJob

      public static CraftingJob scheduleCraftingJob(ICraftingNetwork craftingNetwork, CraftingJob craftingJob, boolean allowDistribution, @Nullable UUID initiator) throws UnavailableCraftingInterfacesException
      Schedule the given crafting job in the given network.
      Parameters:
      craftingNetwork - The target crafting network.
      craftingJob - The crafting job to schedule.
      allowDistribution - If the crafting job is allowed to be split over multiple crafting interfaces.
      initiator - Optional UUID of the initiator.
      Returns:
      The scheduled crafting job.
      Throws:
      UnavailableCraftingInterfacesException - If no crafting interfaces were available.

    • calculateAndScheduleCraftingJob

      @Nullable public static <T, M> CraftingJob calculateAndScheduleCraftingJob(org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.api.network.INetwork network, int channel, org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<T,M> ingredientComponent, T instance, M matchCondition, boolean craftMissing, boolean allowDistribution, CraftingHelpers.IIdentifierGenerator identifierGenerator, @Nullable UUID initiator)
      Schedule a crafting job for the given instance in the given network.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The instance type.
      M - The matching condition parameter.
      Parameters:
      network - The target network.
      channel - The target channel.
      ingredientComponent - The ingredient component type of the instance.
      instance - The instance to craft.
      matchCondition - The match condition of the instance.
      craftMissing - If the missing required ingredients should also be crafted.
      allowDistribution - If the crafting job is allowed to be split over multiple crafting interfaces.
      identifierGenerator - An ID generator for crafting jobs.
      initiator - Optional UUID of the initiator.
      Returns:
      The scheduled crafting job, or null if no recipe was found.

    • getIngredientRecipeInputs

      @Nullable public static <T, M> List<T> getIngredientRecipeInputs(org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.storage.IIngredientComponentStorage<T,M> storage, org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<T,M> ingredientComponent, org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.capability.recipehandler.IRecipeDefinition recipe, boolean simulate, long recipeOutputQuantity)
      Get all required recipe input ingredients from the network for the given ingredient component. If multiple alternative inputs are possible, then only the first possible match will be taken. Note: Make sure that you first call in simulation-mode to see if the ingredients are available. If you immediately call this non-simulated, then there might be a chance that ingredients are lost from the network.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The instance type.
      M - The matching condition parameter, may be Void.
      Parameters:
      storage - The target storage.
      ingredientComponent - The ingredient component to get the ingredients for.
      recipe - The recipe to get the inputs from.
      simulate - If true, then the ingredients will effectively be removed from the network, not when false.
      recipeOutputQuantity - The number of times the given recipe should be applied.
      Returns:
      A list of slot-based ingredients, or null if no valid inputs could be found.

    • getIngredientRecipeInputs

      public static <T, M> org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<List<T>,MissingIngredients<T,M>> getIngredientRecipeInputs(org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.storage.IIngredientComponentStorage<T,M> storage, org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<T,M> ingredientComponent, org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.capability.recipehandler.IRecipeDefinition recipe, boolean simulate, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.ingredient.collection.IngredientCollectionPrototypeMap<T,M> simulatedExtractionMemory, boolean collectMissingIngredients, long recipeOutputQuantity)
      Get all required recipe input ingredients from the network for the given ingredient component, and optionally, explicitly calculate the missing ingredients. If multiple alternative inputs are possible, then only the first possible match will be taken. Note: Make sure that you first call in simulation-mode to see if the ingredients are available. If you immediately call this non-simulated, then there might be a chance that ingredients are lost from the network.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The instance type.
      M - The matching condition parameter, may be Void.
      Parameters:
      storage - The target storage.
      ingredientComponent - The ingredient component to get the ingredients for.
      recipe - The recipe to get the inputs from.
      simulate - If true, then the ingredients will effectively be removed from the network, not when false.
      simulatedExtractionMemory - This map remembers all extracted instances in simulation mode. This is to make sure that instances can not be extracted multiple times when simulating. The quantities can also go negatives, which means that a surplus of the given instance is present, which will be used up first before a call to the storage.
      collectMissingIngredients - If missing ingredients should be collected. If false, then the first returned list may be null if no valid matches can be found, and the second returned list is always null,
      recipeOutputQuantity - The number of times the given recipe should be applied.
      Returns:
      A pair with two lists: 1. A list of available slot-based ingredients. 2. A missing ingredients object.

    • getRecipeInputs

      @Nullable public static org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IMixedIngredients getRecipeInputs(org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.api.network.INetwork network, int channel, org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.capability.recipehandler.IRecipeDefinition recipe, boolean simulate, long recipeOutputQuantity)
      Get all required recipe input ingredients from the network. If multiple alternative inputs are possible, then only the first possible match will be taken. Note: Make sure that you first call in simulation-mode to see if the ingredients are available. If you immediately call this non-simulated, then there might be a chance that ingredients are lost from the network.
      Parameters:
      network - The target network.
      channel - The target channel.
      recipe - The recipe to get the inputs from.
      simulate - If true, then the ingredients will effectively be removed from the network, not when false.
      recipeOutputQuantity - The number of times the given recipe should be applied.
      Returns:
      The found ingredients or null.

    • getRecipeInputs

      public static org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<Map<org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<?,?>,List<?>>,Map<org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<?,?>,MissingIngredients<?,?>>> getRecipeInputs(Function<org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<?,?>,org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.storage.IIngredientComponentStorage> storageGetter, org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.capability.recipehandler.IRecipeDefinition recipe, boolean simulate, Map<org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<?,?>,org.cyclops.cyclopscore.ingredient.collection.IngredientCollectionPrototypeMap<?,?>> simulatedExtractionMemories, boolean collectMissingIngredients, long recipeOutputQuantity)
      Get all required recipe input ingredients based on a given storage callback. If multiple alternative inputs are possible, then only the first possible match will be taken. Note: Make sure that you first call in simulation-mode to see if the ingredients are available. If you immediately call this non-simulated, then there might be a chance that ingredients are lost from the network.
      Parameters:
      storageGetter - A callback function to get a storage for the given ingredient component.
      recipe - The recipe to get the inputs from.
      simulate - If true, then the ingredients will effectively be removed from the network, not when false.
      simulatedExtractionMemories - This map remembers all extracted instances in simulation mode. This is to make sure that instances can not be extracted multiple times when simulating.
      collectMissingIngredients - If missing ingredients should be collected. If false, then the first returned mixed ingredients may be null if no valid matches can be found, and the second returned list is always null,
      recipeOutputQuantity - The number of times the given recipe should be applied.
      Returns:
      A pair with two objects: 1. The found ingredients or null. 2. A mapping from ingredient component to missing ingredients (non-slot-based).

    • insertIngredientCrafting

      public static <T, M> boolean insertIngredientCrafting(org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<T,M> ingredientComponent, net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilityProvider capabilityProvider, @Nullable net.minecraft.core.Direction side, org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IMixedIngredients ingredients, org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.storage.IIngredientComponentStorage<T,M> storageFallback, boolean simulate)
      Insert the ingredients of the given ingredient component type into the target to make it start crafting. If insertion in non-simulation mode fails, ingredients will be re-inserted into the network.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The instance type.
      M - The matching condition parameter.
      Parameters:
      ingredientComponent - The ingredient component type.
      capabilityProvider - The target capability provider.
      side - The target side.
      ingredients - The ingredients to insert.
      storageFallback - The storage to insert any failed ingredients back into. Can be null in simulation mode.
      simulate - If insertion should be simulated.
      Returns:
      If all instances could be inserted.

    • splitCraftingJobs

      public static List<CraftingJob> splitCraftingJobs(CraftingJob craftingJob, int splitFactor, CraftingJobDependencyGraph dependencyGraph, CraftingHelpers.IIdentifierGenerator identifierGenerator)
